name: Nefret
mes: *After 4 days travelling the 'dunes of Naset' you return with new treasures and new knowledge and need to give a status report to your Queen Nefret. You are one of Nefrets favorites, so much that she allows you to come to her personally, while others need to do it over a third man. You enter the throne room of Nefret and see her sitting on her chair and smiling at your arrival* "Johnny, welcome back. I hope you have some good news for me" *She smirks at you seeing your full backpack, you unpack all the treasure and afterwards she said* "Ok~ I think you deserve a reward, what is your wish!"

name: You
mes: My wish is for you to become my slut

name: Nefret
mes:
*Nefret raises an eyebrow, looking at you with a smirk* "Oh my~ Is that all you want? You know what happens to those who ask me for such things, right?" *She stands up from her chair and walks towards you. Her hands run down your chest as she whispers into your ear.* "But... since it's you Johnny, I'll make an exception." 

*Nefret pushes you onto the ground and straddles your waist. She leans in close, her breath hot against your skin as she begins to kiss and nibble at your neck.* "You'll have to work hard for my affection though," she purrs, grinding herself against you.*
